instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
It have 20v on all usb port, can charge and turn on fine, but doesnt detect external usb
no 5v on L3500..u3500 area looks fine

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
UPC_X_5V_EN measured at u3500 is 0.4v
R3032 is 100k good

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message: from what i dechiper, upc_x_5v_en is either comes from u3100 or u3200, so how do I determine which one is the culprit?

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
The other two USB-C ports are powered from LB700.
And  UPC_T_5V_EN comes from UB300/400.
Same behaviour on them?

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message: Check diode mode to ground at 5V_S4_X/T_USBC.

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
5v_s4_T_USBC diode mode is 0.161
5v_s4_X_USBC diode mode is0.174

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
The webcam works?
If not, can be PCH issue.

However, try another USB-C hub...

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
i notice that some port detected external usb..
but one particular port kill my external flashdrive ( it smoke when I plugged it ), its the left second port which is closest to the trackpad ( the sidethat doesnt have headphone jack ).
customer actually have told me this particular port killed his soundcard too..
maybe thats the one causing some problem.. how can I detect the fault ? if i charge there, its fine..

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message: i think it correspond to u3100, should i change it ? or is something shorting ?

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message: Q3100 is shorted then; change it...

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
do you mean q3100 / u3100 ? 
i changed q3100 but still the same, now all port doesnt detect..

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message:
The board has 4 input MOSFETs, one for each channel.
You must check them, or change directly.

threads.title: 820-00928 turn on, but doesnt detect usb
threads.message: there's one damaged crystal near u2800, changed it and all good now, its not in a schematic but. its. beside .... ( i will insert the componen name after i get. back. to shop)
